description: The Antibody Registry provides identifiers for antibodies used in publications. It lists commercial antibodies from numerous vendors, each assigned with a unique identifier. Unlisted antibodies can be submitted by providing the catalog number and vendor information.
name: Antibody Registry

resources.description: Antibody Registry at University of California

institution.description: The Neuroscience Information Framework is a dynamic inventory of Web-based neuroscience resources: data, materials, and tools accessible via any computer connected.
institution.name: Neuroscience Information Framework, University of California, San Diego,  California

resources.name: Antibody Registry at University of California
